errors.error_description: Specifies using outdated Python 2.7 instead of Python 3, which is deprecated and incompatible with modern dependencies
correction_candidates: Make sure you have Python 3.8 or higher installed for compatibility
Ensure you have Python 3.6+ installed for optimal performance
Use Python 3.7 or later for full feature support
Install Python 3.9 or newer for the best experience
errors.golden_answer: Make sure you have Python 3.8 or higher installed for compatibility
